Define class ATSError with attribute(s) and method(s). Define error message container for console log mechanism.
class ats_utilities.console_io.error.ATSError[source]¶

Bases: ats_utilities.console_io.ATSConsoleIO

Define class ATSError with attribute(s) and method(s). Define error message container for console log mechanism. It defines:

attributes:
__slots__ - Setting class slots
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase
__message - Error message container
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor
message - Public setter/getter
VERBOSE = 'ATS_UTILITIES::CONSOLE_IO::ERROR'¶
message¶

Public property getter.

Returns:Formatted errors message
Return type:<str>
Exceptions:None
registry = set([<class 'ats_utilities.console_io.verbose.ATSVerbose'>, <class 'ats_utilities.console_io.error.ATSError'>])¶

  • message (<tuple>) – Message parts

Define class ATSConsoleIO with attribute(s) and method(s). Define message container for console log mechanism.
class ats_utilities.console_io.ATSConsoleIO[source]¶

Bases: object

Define class ATSConsoleIO with attribute(s) and method(s). Define message container for console log mechanism.

  • verbose (Colorize text to blue)
  • warning (Colorize text to yellow)
  • error (Colorize text to red)

It defines:

attributes:
__metaclass__ - Setting metaclass
methods:
None
registry = set([<class 'ats_utilities.console_io.verbose.ATSVerbose'>, <class 'ats_utilities.console_io.error.ATSError'>, <class 'ats_utilities.console_io.success.ATSSuccess'>, <class 'ats_utilities.console_io.warning.ATSWarning'>])¶
